name: Counter Unknown Battlegrounds Strike Sniper Royale
name_original: Counter Unknown Battlegrounds Strike Sniper Royale
description:
Become an American survivor Commando in the greatest war in our Counter Unknown Battlegrounds Strike Sniper Royale shooting game. Counter unknown strike of the history on your country. Perform as ww2 survival commando on very secret missions. You have to change the outcome of this World War 2 (WW2). Our first person shooting game is not just a game this is battle of survival in battlegrounds like desert snow and more.

Counter Unknown Battlegrounds Strike Sniper Royale is a survival shooting game. Here is the #1 FPS shooting game on android mobile! Get into the war with counter terrorist and enemy commandos. To prove your sniper kill skills in the king of 3D shooting games. Make the fallen nation proud as hero of world war 2. Play as the shadow of gun legends in our legendary shooting game. 

Arm of war hero of ww2 is waiting for their best sniper. You are equipped with deadly sniper weapons, machine guns and the latest military gears to accomplish champions’ missions. You are inside enemy hostile territory! Our free FPS action game. In battle grounds Kill legends, your duty is to survive & fight war to save the world. You have to do hunting shooter terrorists, killing killer zombies and waging enemy war on evil armies. 

Call yourself a sharp shooter? Then put your skills to the test in the top free sniper game for Android. 

*Many Exciting Missions*

Special Forces commando! Navigate in secret killer missions across the globe. Shoot hostile terrorist forces that destroy a peaceful world.

In Counter Unknown Battlegrounds Strike Sniper you have to shoot arrows & mark the enemy terrorists. Shoot from long and short distance with sneak agility. If you are located by enemy sniper soldier he will kill you with single shot. Get into the intense shooting challenges from as archer champions with in missions. Fight like a modern knight for honor your home land. Aim as the legends of war hero for target shoot. Enjoy the bow & arrow as a master from ancient legends. Hit for destroy. We best archery hero legend and fps shooting fun together. Enjoy best as an archer or bowman game like no other before. Look in the deadly areas as sniper to make kill in arena of all soldiers and enemies. 

To accomplish (Counter Unknown Battlegrounds Strike Sniper) as a legends world of heros these missions, play as real archer and sniper shooting commando package. In survival mission we prepared you as a real commando. You are fully trained commando and heavily equipped with different kinds of assault and sniper weapons. We simulated the weapons of World War 2 (WW2) used during the war.  We have simulated full real World War 2 (WW2) killing. 

Some Counter Unknown Battlegrounds Strike Sniper Royale Features:

• Amazing World War 2 (WW2) Game
• TPS game fun in FPS for those who love playing WW2 Games.
• Secret agent shooting to accomplish 
• Stealthy missions to complete.
• Full Action packed Commando Game.
• Download its Totally free to play.
• Smooth and Steady Controls.
• Real HD graphics 
• Amazing sound effects.
• Many Missions & achievements to accomplish with a Story Mode.
•World War 2 (WW2) guns.
